snippet.title: The Soul Ring | Tales of Aragon | Scars of Honor
snippet.description:
In chapter II of the "Tales of Aragon" series, we will immerse you into the world of the second race created by The Old Gods - the Infernal Demons and their never-ending hunger for power!
Hungry for souls, wielders of the Infernal Fire and Masters of the Soul Leech - Queen Gremorah and King Satanyr won't stop at anything to awaken the Soul Ring, that will make them equal to the Gods themselves!

Share in the comments how you like this video and don't forget to register for the next game test (will share more information soon) at:
https://www.scarsofhonor.com/landing/start

In the meantime, you can download our new app and try your daily luck to win cool perks:
Google Play Store 🤖 -  https://beast.ly/Nnz53Bu
Apple App Store 🍎 - https://beast.ly/7fZCVjQ

👕 The Beast Burst Merch Shop - https://beast.ly/OcdIiKU

■ Discord: https://discord.gg/8QqTndQbuG
■ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ScarsOfHonor.Official
■ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scars.of.honor/
■ Twitter: https://twitter.com/scars_of_honor/
■ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ScarsofHonor/
